title: Final Velocity
text: Final $${velocity}^2$$ $$=$$ initial velocity** subtracted by $$2acceleration$$ multiplied by the change in position. We can rearrange this equation to solve for position.

title: Solving
text: We can solve this problem by doing the following: inital $${velocity}^2$$ - $${velocity}^2$$ at maximum height + $$2{acceleration}^2$$ multiplied by inital height of fiving $$\frac{board}{2} acceleration$$.
